      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Warrior
      Class representing warrior in the game A warrior is defined by this informations : name : picture URL : life level : attack strength : attack tool : defense tool : square board position : A warrior can have actions such as : welcome display informations
      class  Wizard
      Class representing wizard in the game A wizard is defined by this informations : name : picture URL : life level : attack strength : attack tool : defense tool : square board position : A wizard can have actions such as : welcome display informations
